title: China to hunt for Earth-like planets with formation-flying telescopes
summary: China aims to construct an array of telescopes in deep space to search for habitable planets orbiting other stars.

title: United States and South Korea agree to enhance space cooperation
summary: The United States and South Korea signed an agreement April 25 to enhance cooperation on space activities ranging from lunar exploration to Earth science, while providing few specific about those efforts.

title: X-Bow announces $60 million STRATFI agreement
summary: X-Bow Systems, an Albuquerque, N.M., solid propulsion startup, announced a $60 million U.S. Air Force Strategic Funding Increase, or STRATFI, agreement.

title: Astrobotic purchases Falcon Heavy for third lunar lander mission
summary: Lunar lander developer Astrobotic announced April 25 it will launch a third mission to the moon in 2026 on a SpaceX Falcon Heavy.

title: AST SpaceMobile conducts first direct-to-device voice test
summary: AST SpaceMobile announced April 25 it made the first voice call last week with a standard smartphone using its BlueWalker 3 test satellite in low Earth orbit.
